The model class for the card game.

Represents the four possible colors (suits) of a standard playing card.
CardModel.CardValue
Represents the thirteen possible value of a standard playing card.

WebsocketClient
WebsocketClient handles the WebSocket connection to the server, manages message sending and receiving, and processes game and waiting room updates.
WebsocketServer
WebsocketServer manages the WebSocket server, handling client connections, waiting rooms, and game-related operations.
